timeline.bodyText: How about renaming this to "JdbcReadRowsRegistrar". Current name make this sounds like a transform while in reality this is just a utility to register the existing transform with the expansion service.
timeline.author: chamikaramj

timeline.bodyText: Probably "beam:external:java:jdbc:read_rows:v1" is more unique to this transform
timeline.author: chamikaramj
chamikaramj

timeline.bodyText: How about calling this "BeamRowPreparedStatementSetter" and moving this out of external directory ? This sounds like a more generic utility.
timeline.author: chamikaramj

timeline.bodyText: Please add unit tests for these conversions.
timeline.author: chamikaramj

replies.bodyText: @chamikaramj  I'll do a separate PR for this on Monday. I don't get how should I deal with such PRs that depend on each other? I'm used to Gerrit where every commit is a separate PR rebased on the previous commit. But here it would be a duplicate PR with one more commit. Is that ok or there is a smarter way to publish a PR based on the changes that are not merged yet and reviewed in another PR?
replies.author: piotr-szuberski

timeline.bodyText: How about adding unit tests for Builder classes for read and write ?
timeline.author: chamikaramj

replies.bodyText: Ok, I'll do that on Monday. Could it be on separate PR? This one is already a big one.
replies.author: piotr-szuberski

replies.bodyText: A separate PR for this is fine. Thanks.
replies.author: chamikaramj
